synopsis.text:
Unwilling to be deterred by the blazing inferno of Fire Mountain, Tang Sanzang and his three protectors—Sun Wukong, Zhu Bajie, and Sha Wujing—embark on a daring quest to obtain the magical fan that holds the power to extinguish the flames in "Princess Iron Fan." Based on a captivating episode from the classic Chinese novel "Journey to the West," this animated feature film follows the group as they face the formidable challenge of securing the fan from the clutches of the powerful Princess Iron Fan.

As the wife of the Bull Demon King, Princess Iron Fan is not one to easily part with her prized possession, especially after Sun Wukong's previous altercation with her husband. Determined to continue their journey westward, the three protectors must rely on their shape-shifting abilities and cunning strategies to outwit the princess and acquire the fan. Will they succeed in quenching the flames that stand between them and their destination, or will the vengeful princess thwart their efforts? Join Tang Sanzang and his loyal companions in this thrilling adventure as they navigate the treacherous path to obtain the legendary Princess Iron Fan's magical artifact.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
